title: two quality of life things i would like to see
body:
QoL one hextech chests
at the moment we track what champs we have earned chests on our champion profile page 
we should be able to track these champions in champion select its not much of an issue at the moment but once there are 30+ champions locked out it may be an issue for some

QoL two one button champion cycling 
at the moment we can cycle through champions in game by pressing f1 f2 f3 f4 f5 which helps people who play champions with semi or full global ability's including teleport 
it would be an improvement for people who dont have the dexterity of the hands to use the f keys to make a one button champion cycle and the cycle would go by the order you have your tab screen 

these are just two that i find would be a very good improvement anyone else have any thoughts on these two or add there own?

replies.body: What do you mean cycle through champs with Function keys?
You can lock the camera on your team's champions by holding the corresponding f1-5 key. You didn't know this?
I will say now, I never knew of this. I always saw people (youtubers, steamers, etc) occasionally do it, but I always wondered.....lel
it helps improve my map awareness alot but i dont have the finger dexterity to use the f keys effectively would be nice to have a one button cycle
See, I have a Mac, and I tried doing it yesterday, but nothing worked. Maybe I just have to go in the settings and check out the bindings.
